resources.string: Select a standard hotkey or choose \'Custom\' and hold Ctrl,Shift and/or Alt and type your desired hotkey for language %1$s:

string.name: SKSetHotkey_Interface

string.name: SKUnsafeHotkey
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with standard keyboard use

resources.string: The hotkey %1$s will conflict with normal keyboard use. You should use at least Ctrl or Alt. Do you want to change this now\?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Keyboard
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another keyboard

resources.string: The hotkey %1$s conflicts with the hotkey selected for keyboard %2$s. If you continue, the hotkey for keyboard %2$s will be cleared. Continue\?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Interface
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another interface hotkey

resources.string: The hotkey %1$s conflicts with another hotkey. If you continue, the other hotkey will be cleared. Continue\?

string.name: SKApplicationTitle
string.comment: Product name used for the title of message boxes and message dialogs

string.name: SKSplashVersion
string.comment: Version number

string.name: SKButtonPrint
string.comment: Print button in Welcome dialog for keyboards

string.name: SKPackageAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: A package with the name %1$s is already installed. Do you want to uninstall it and install the new one\?

string.name: SKKeyboardAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: A keyboard with the name \'%1$s\' is already installed. If you continue, it will be uninstalled before the new one is installed. Continue\?

string.name: SKKeyboardPartOfPackage
string.comment: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package

resources.string: The keyboard \'%1$s\' is part of package \'%2$s\'. You must uninstall the entire package. Continue\?

string.name: SKInstallLanguageTransientLimit
string.comment: Message shown when Keyman is unable to install a Windows language for a keyboard

resources.string: Unable to install keyboard language; Windows has a limit of 4 custom \'transient\' languages, and you may have reached this limit.

string.name: SKPackageDoesNotIncludeWelcome
string.comment: Notice of lack of introductory help

resources.string: The package or keyboard \'%1$s\' does not include any introductory help.

string.name: SKOSNotSupported
string.comment: Notice of unsupported operating system

resources.string: This operating system is not supported.

string.name: SKOnlineHelpFile
string.comment: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file

string.name: SKCouldNotFindHelp
string.comment: Notice of help file not found

resources.string: Fail nǝr dlarɛ adi ɓuidzi wɛ.

string.name: SKANSIEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with an ANSI or Codepage encoding

string.name: SKUnicodeEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with a Unicode encoding

string.name: SKDownloadProgress_Title
string.comment: Notice of file downloading

string.name: SKUninstallOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall OSK for a keyboard layout

resources.string: Gǝ mbursa apǝri gada bara ka kǝlba kibod nam ata screen namtǝ ndǝ vu ala %1$s\?

string.name: SKUninstallKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall keyboard layout

resources.string: Gada bara ka kǝlba ka ɗalba kibod ya%1$s\?

string.name: SKUninstallPackage
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall a package

resources.string: Gada bara ka kǝlba ka ɗalba package ya%1$s\?\n\n%2$s

string.name: SKUninstallPackageFonts
string.comment: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall.

resources.string: Font ǝniyere ndata faba ka punta tǝdar: %1$s.

string.name: SKUnicodeData_Build
string.comment: Request to build Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: The Character Map has a database of characters that needs to be built before it can be used. Build it now\?

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseCouldNotBeDeleted
string.comment: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: The Unicode Character database could not be deleted for a rebuild. Error details are: %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_CouldNotCreateDatabase
string.comment: Error creating Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: The Unicode Character database could not be created and has been disabled. Error details are: %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseLoadFailedRebuild
string.comment: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild.

resources.string: Unicode Karakta database did not load successfully (%1$s). Ɓǝla dzakti tsati tǝni kulini\?

string.name: SKCannotStartProduct
string.comment: Error from Keyman failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found

resources.string:
Keyman ngǝlata mburi. Usɛ chakǝnta security settingyere nǝngɛ akuya ka gǝ wuti apǝri program nǝr keyman.exe ada ɓui ka mburntadzi kǝmata lǝkǝma aka su. su kura kal kal namtǝ sari si akǝr ani:

"%1$s"

ka gada bara ka gǝ nkǝrti ka badicini Keyman ka dawm kulini ya\?

string.name: SKDebuggingWarning
string.comment: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab

resources.string:
Keyman debug information will be stored in a log file called %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (where # is a number). You should exit Keyman before attempting to delete this file.

\WARNING: This file can grow large very quickly. Enabling debugging may slow down your system and should only be done if advised by technical support.

PRIVACY WARNING: Please note that the debug logfile records all keystrokes that you type. You should only turn on the debug log for the duration of a debugging or diagnostic session.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_PleaseWait
string.comment: OSK Font helper message

resources.string: Please wait while searching for related fonts for keyboard %1$s

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NonUnicode
string.comment: OSK Font helper non-Unicode keyboard

resources.string: Keyboard %1$s is not a Unicode keyboard. Fonts cannot be automatically located. Please check the keyboard documentation for font information.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NoKeyboards
string.comment: OSK Font helper no keyboards

resources.string: Ndadi vu keyboard layoutyere ata saka ǝni wɛ.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_ChooseKeyboard
string.comment: OSK Font helper choose keyboard

resources.string: Usɛ tsarbaPlease Keyman kibod akuya ka gǝ ɓui fontyere namtǝ gada bara.

string.name: SKTextEditorCaption
string.comment: Caption of Text Editor
